GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.38 to before v4.9.337
GSD.description:
serial: pch: Fix PCI device refcount leak in pch_request_dma()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit 90ff030ca10b69feeebda1427550ebf9ed2ad868, it was introduced in version v2.6.38 by commit 3c6a483275f47a2ef7119309ad3d791c10cf30da. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: serial: pch: Fix PCI device refcount leak in pch_request_dma()
